values: To mimic something means to copy the way it sounds, moves, looks, etc.
The hunter mimicked a duck’s call and shot the two ducks that called back.
v. to copy especially of humor 模仿
v. to naturally look like 和...相似
camouflage, replicate
vt. 模仿，摹拟 n. 效颦者，模仿者；仿制品；小丑 adj. 模仿的，模拟的；假装的
